chatroomserver

Class dataEncrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatroomserver.dataEncrypt

  • public final class dataEncrypt
extends java.lang.Object
    Can encrypt text, decrypt text, generate key pairs, hash passwords

                                     java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                     javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                     javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Encrypts a byte array and return the String representation of them to be over TCP. Singly encrypts the bytes to send from the server

        bytes - the bytes to be encrypted
        pubKey -
        id -
        Returns:
        The string of the encrypted bytes

                                    javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

      • decryptBytes

        public byte[] decryptBytes(java.lang.String string)
                    throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                           javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                           javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Decrypts a string once with the server's private key.
        Parameters:
        string - The doubly encrypted string that the user received.
        Returns:
        the decrypted data in byte array format
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

      • decryptText

        public java.lang.String decryptText(java.lang.String msg,
                                    java.security.PublicKey pubKey)
                             throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                    javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                    javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                    java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decrypts a string twice, Once with the server's private key. Then with the public of whoever the message was sent from.
        Parameters:
        msg - the doubly encrypted string that the user received.
        pubKey -
        Returns:
        the decrypted data in string format.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
